modules.name: string_decoder
modules.desc:
To use this module, do require('string_decoder'). StringDecoder decodes a buffer to a string. It is a simple interface to buffer.toString() but provides additional support for utf8.

const StringDecoder = require('string_decoder').StringDecoder;
const decoder = new StringDecoder('utf8');

const cent = new Buffer([0xC2, 0xA2]);
console.log(decoder.write(cent));

const euro = new Buffer([0xE2, 0x82, 0xAC]);
console.log(decoder.write(euro));

classes.name: StringDecoder
classes.desc: Accepts a single argument, encoding which defaults to 'utf8'.

methods.name: end
methods.desc: Returns any trailing bytes that were left in the buffer.
